Description:
Detects addition of users to highly privileged groups via "Net" or "Add-LocalGroupMember".

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: User Added To Highly Privileged Group
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((command like '%localgroup %' and command like '% /add%') and (command like '%add-localgroupmember %' and command like '% -group %')) and (command like '%group policy creator owners%' or command like '%schema admins%'))
